1: New court commitment, also on parole
2: New court commitment, also under parole supervision after conditional/statutory release
4: Returned for parole violation (RPV) without new sentence
5: Returned for parole violation (RPV) after conditional/statutory release, without new sentence
7: Returned from Mental Hygiene institution or DACC (originally under Corrections)
8: Returned after absconding from temporary release
9: New court commitment, returned after absconding from temporary release
